message: Hello. My name is Alex. Thank you for reaching out to PlaySure Gaming. How can I assist you today?
Hi, I placed a bet earlier today, and I noticed the odds changed just before I confirmed it. It feels unfair—why did that happen?
I completely understand your concern. Let’s run through security so I can take a look at your account and investigate the issue. Can you confirm your name, email, and also confirm your date of birth?
Sure, my name is David Thompson, my email is david.t@example.com, and my date of birth is January 8, 1985.

Thanks, David. That's all correct! I understand how frustrating it can be when odds change unexpectedly. Odds are dynamic and can fluctuate based on real-time events, betting patterns, and market conditions.
But I was in the process of placing the bet, and it changed right when I clicked confirm. That doesn’t seem fair.

I completely understand your frustration, David. The odds can change at any point until the bet is fully confirmed. This is to ensure fairness and accuracy based on the latest market data. However, I can check if there were any issues with your bet placement.
Okay, please check and let me know.

I've reviewed your bet history, and I can confirm that the odds changed just before the bet confirmation due to a market adjustment. This happens automatically to reflect current conditions. To avoid such instances, we recommend reviewing the odds carefully before finalizing the bet.
Alright, thanks for checking. I’ll be more careful next time.
You're very welcome, David! I'm glad I was able to help. If you need any further assistance, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
